about_the_game:
The undead never rest, and neither should you! Dive into the chaos of Horde Together, a heart-pounding co-op survival game where you and your friends must fight endless waves of zombies and monstrous creatures. Strategize, scavenge, and survive as you battle through relentless hordes, upgrade your arsenal, and gear up for the ultimate fight for survival. How long can you last before the apocalypse claims you?

Choose Your Survivor

Select from a roster of unique characters, each with their own backstory, special abilities, and playstyle. Whether you’re a sharpshooter, a brawler, or a tactical mastermind, there’s a survivor for every strategy.

Battle the Horde

Face off against relentless waves of zombies and terrifying monsters, each more dangerous than the last. Work together with your team to hold the line, manage resources, and survive as long as possible. The horde grows stronger with every wave—can you outlast them?

The Ultimate Armory

Scavenge for resources during the battle to purchase powerful weapons from the in-game shop. From shotguns and assault rifles and explosives, arm yourself to the teeth and unleash devastation on the undead. Upgrade your weapons to maximize their effectiveness and turn the tide of battle.

Gear Up for Survival

Survival isn’t just about firepower—gear up to stay alive! Purchase armor, med kits, and tactical equipment to boost your durability and keep your team in the fight. Customize your loadout to suit your playstyle and adapt to the ever-growing threat.

Game Features

  • 2-5 Player Online Co-op: Team up with friends or join forces with players worldwide to survive the apocalypse together.

  • A Roster of Legends: Play as one of 16 iconic characters, each with their own story and abilities. From sharpshooters to brawlers, every character brings something special to the fight.

  • Firepower Galore: Access a massive selection of weapons, including assault rifles, grenade launchers, and more. Upgrade your firepower to take down even the toughest monsters.

  • Expansive Battle Zones: Battle across a range of environments, including abandoned towns, eerie swamps, and industrial wastelands. Adapt your tactics to survive in each unique setting.

In Horde Together, every decision matters. Will you fight to the bitter end, or will the horde overwhelm you? Gather your team, gear up, and prepare for the fight of your life!
